entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:04 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
